Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Inside of the Dark room on the Oteybis that was Hellpeons room, the massive 
crystal inside suddenly cracked and shattered sending a blinding light 
throughout the room as well as a wave of energy that ripped the door from 
Hellpeons chamber out of the walls and smashing into and through another. 
When the light faded a bright red glow moved out of the room, and once that 
subsided a massive towering metallic form stood in the hall, its eyes flaring 
a bright lime. Silently it walked towards the Free For All area of the 
Oteybis to fulfil its task.

--part1_147.4ed9988.292c3cb3_boundary
